summary:
Modders Resource of upper class furniture in 5 textures
Updated version with Pillow Fix
descriptionHtml:
Name: Arie Manor Furniture
Version: 2.0B
Date: 7/04/2012
Category: Resources
Author: Arion
Source: TES Alliance

=================
Requirements:
=================

Skyrim 1.5 or above

=================
Description:
=================

Modder\'s Resource of retextured of the UpperClass furniture - full set and NobleDoubleBed02 in 5 wood textures.
esp included so you are able to go and look at the furniture. Screenshot of location next to the brewery outside Whiterun.
Children\'s beds are included but not displayed.
Now includes full set of display cases as well to match the rest of the furniture

NOTE:
Only needed for the old file. New version 2B has the fix included.....
Added an optional file to fix the pillows that had wooden sides. Extract the furniture fix file and copy it to your skyrim data folder and when it asks to replace files say YES.
=================
Installation
=================

1. Extract this archive to any folder and then copy the contents to Skyrim\'s Data
folder.  
2. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, and enable the .esp file(s).

=================
Un-Installation:
=================

1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

=================
Incompatibility:
=================

None known

=================
Known Issues:
=================

None Known

=================
History:
=================
7/04/2012 - version 2B released - fixed pillow sides having wood tecture
6/10/2012 - version 2 released - Added display cases to match the rest of the furniture 
5/9/2012 - version 1 released

=================
Contact:
=================

PM Arion @tesalliance.org

=================
Credits:
=================

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to InsanitySorrow for his ReadMe Generator this file is based on.
Thanks to Ampolx for use of the intstainwood01 and 02 textures.
Thanks to Hentai for use the of original blackgloss01 texture.
Thanks to Xiamara for the use of the original mahogany texture.
Thanks to SweetSoulSister for Red Mahogany texture - http://sweetsoulsister.deviantart.com/art/Red-Mahogany-Wood-Texture-146083467


=================
Tools Used:
=================

Insanity\'s ReadMe Generator
Photoshop
GIMP
NifSkope


=================
Licensing/Legal:
=================

This is a modders resource and you are allowed to use any of the resources included as long as the Original authors must be given credit. I would like to see pictures of any work that includes my work if possible.
author: Arion
